    description={upper limit of number of instances allowed by a cloud provider $p$}
}

    symbol={\ensuremath{n^{Imax}}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{instance_max_machines}[_{i}]  > 0,\in \mathbb{Z}}},
    description={upper limit of number of instances allowed by a cloud provider of instance $i$}
}

    symbol={\ensuremath{p^I}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{instance_price}[_{i_1}]  \ge 0}},
    description={a fee (in US dollars) for running the instance of type $i$ for one hour}
}

}

    symbol={\ensuremath{l}},

}

    symbol={\ensuremath{r}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{transfer_rate}[_{i,s}]  \ge 0}},
    description={data transfer rates between a given storage site $s$ and instance $i$ in MiB per second}
}
\newglossaryentry{exec_time} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{t^x}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{exec_time}[_{g}]  \ge 0}},
    description={execution time in hours of a single task in a group $g$ on a machine with the processor performance of 1 CloudHarmony Compute Unit (CCU)}
}
\newglossaryentry{task_count} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{A^{tot}}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{task_count}[_{g}]  > 0,\in \mathbb{Z}}},
    description={number of tasks in a group $g$}
}
\newglossaryentry{data_size_in} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{d^{in}}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{data_size_in}[_{g}]  \ge 0}},
    description={data size for input of a task in group $g$}
}
\newglossaryentry{data_size_out} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{d^{out}}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{data_size_out}[_{g}]  \ge 0}},
    description={data size for output of a task in group $g$}
}
\newglossaryentry{workflow_deadline} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{t^D}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{workflow_deadline}  > 0,\in \mathbb{Z}}},
    description={total time allowed for completing workflow (deadline)}
}
\newglossaryentry{storage} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{s}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{storage} symbol}},
    description={a selected storage site}
}
\newglossaryentry{transfer_time} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{t^{net}}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{transfer_time}[_{t,i,s}]  = {\frac{\glssymbol{data_size_in}[_{t}] + \glssymbol{data_size_out}[_{t}]}{\glssymbol{transfer_rate}[_{i,s}] \cdot 3600}}}},
    description={{\em transfer time} in hours, i.e. time for data transfer between instances of type $i$ and storage site $s$ for a task in task group $g$}
}
\newglossaryentry{unit_time} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{t^u}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{unit_time}[_{t,i,s}]  = {\glssymbol{max}(\frac{\glssymbol{exec_time}[_{t}]}{\glssymbol{ccu}[_{i}]}, \ \glssymbol{transfer_time}[_{t,i,storage}])}}},
    description={time in hours for processing a task in group $g$ on instance of type $i$ using storage site $s$}
}
\newglossaryentry{transfer_cost} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{c^T}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{transfer_cost}[_{t,i,s}]  = {(\glssymbol{data_size_out}[_{t}] \cdot (\glssymbol{instance_transfer_price_out}[_{i}] + \glssymbol{storage_transfer_price_in}[_{s}]) + \glssymbol{data_size_in}[_{t}] \cdot (\glssymbol{storage_transfer_price_out}[_{s}] + \glssymbol{instance_transfer_price_in}[_{i}])) \cdot \glssymbol{local}[_{i,s}]}}},
    description={a cost of data transfer between an instance of type $i$ and a storage site $s$ when processing task in group $g$}
}
